title: Ultra Deluxe Flagship Catamaran
body:
If you’re looking for a truly-amazing and luxurious on-the-water event, look no further. This incredible 85-foot catamaran has everything you can imagine for the perfect wedding, party, sunset cruise or corporate event. For an incredible experience for up to 149 people, you owe it to yourself to charter this very special yacht.

This amazing 85′ luxurious sailing catamaran has to be seen to be believed. Its handcrafted details are unsurpassed and this is one of the most opulent vessels in the Santa Barbara harbor. There are three levels, 3000 square feet of space, a full bar, library, media room and so much more.

$3250 per hr. (2 hr. min.) plus 12% port fee & 18% gratuity.
